meanings.definition: A person or group that oppresses others.
meanings.sent1: The oppressors in the story made life difficult for the main character.
meanings.sent2: The oppressors in history have caused much suffering to many people.
meanings.sent3: The oppressors in the movie were portrayed as comically evil.
meanings.sent4: The oppressors in society can be seen as the barriers to progress.
meanings.sent5: The image of the oppressors stayed in the minds of the oppressed.

meanings.definition: Those who exercise authority or power in a cruel or unjust manner.
meanings.sent1: We must stand up against the oppressors who abuse their power.
meanings.sent2: The oppressors in the government were overthrown by the people.
meanings.sent3: The oppressors in the play were hilariously defeated by the underdogs.
meanings.sent4: The oppressors in the story were like dark clouds blocking the sun.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the oppressors lingered in the minds of the oppressed.
